patthana16.63:4.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho āsavavippayutto nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.63:4.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naanidassanasappaṭigho āsavavippayutto nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.63:4.3: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ sāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nasanidassanasappaṭigho āsavavippayutto nasāsavo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho āsavavippayutto nasāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.63:5.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana16.63:5.2: Anidassanaappaṭighaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho āsavavippayutto naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … pe …
patthana16.63:5.4: anidassanaappaṭighaṃ āsavavippayuttaṃ anāsavaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho āsavavippayutto naanāsavo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho āsavavippayutto naanāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana16.63:5.6: Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha … pe … avigate cha.
